data.trans: Chỉ quan tâm đến bản thân, chỉ lo cho mình
data.trans_hint: Anh ta quá quan tâm đến bản thân nói gì đến lo cho chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: He's too self-absorbed to care about us.
data.content_game_1: He's too self-absorbed to care about us.
data.answer_en_hint: He's too self-absorbed to care about us.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy có kinh nghiệm và lòng tự tin.
data.content_game_1: She is experienced and self-assured.
data.answer_en_hint: She is experienced and self-assured.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta hoàn toàn là đồ ích kỷ.
data.content_game_1: He's completely self-centred.

data.trans: Tự mãn, khoa trương, huênh hoang
data.trans_hint: Bài diễn thuyết của anh ta nghe rất kiêu ngạo và huênh hoang.
data.en_hint: His speech sounds very pompous and self-congratulatory.
data.content_game_1: His speech sounds very pompous and self-congratulatory.
data.answer_en_hint: His speech sounds very pompous and self-congratulatory.

data.trans: Tự ti, tự hạ thấp mình
data.trans_hint: Sharon kể lại câu chuyện đêm đó với sự hài hước tự hạ thấp mình.
data.en_hint: Sharon tells the story of that night with self-deprecating humour.
data.content_game_1: Sharon tells the story of that night with self-deprecating humour.
data.answer_en_hint: Sharon tells the story of that night with self-deprecating humour.

data.trans: Tự cao tự đại, kiêu căng
data.trans_hint: Anh ta là một người đàn ông kiêu ngạo.
data.content_game_1: He was a self-important man.
data.answer_en_hint: He was a self-important man.

data.trans: Có khả năng điều chỉnh tốt, ổn định mình
data.trans_hint: Adam là một người đàn ông kiệm lời, có khả năng điều chỉnh tốt. Anh ấy có khả năng phán đoán tốt và tính cách trưởng thành.
data.en_hint: Adam is a quiet, well-adjusted man. He has good judgement and has a mature personality.
data.content_game_1: Adam is a quiet, well-adjusted man. He has good judgement and has a mature personality.
data.answer_en_hint: Adam is a quiet, well-adjusted man. He has good judgement and has a mature personality.

data.trans: Có giáo dục, có cung cách tốt đẹp
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy quá có giáo dục để thể hiện sự thất vọng của mình.
data.en_hint: He was too well bred to show his disappointment.
data.content_game_1: He was too well bred to show his disappointment.
data.answer_en_hint: He was too well bred to show his disappointment.

data.trans: Ăn diện đỏm dáng, ăn mặc đẹp
data.trans_hint: Vợ anh luôn ăn diện đỏm dáng.
data.en_hint: His wife was always well dressed.
data.content_game_1: His wife was always well dressed.
data.answer_en_hint: His wife was always well dressed.

data.trans: Được nuôi dưỡng tốt, có giáo dưỡng
data.trans_hint: Dù gia đình có nhiều vấn đề, lũ trẻ vẫn được nuôi dưỡng tốt.
data.en_hint: Despite the family's problems, the children were well brought up.
data.content_game_1: Despite the family's problems, the children were well brought up.
data.answer_en_hint: Despite the family's problems, the children were well brought up.
